snippet: The shooting in the Guangxi region occurred when a van carrying five Uighurs refused to stop and members of the group resisted arrest with knives, the state news media reported.
abstract: Police in China fatally shoot two members of Uighur ethnic minority attempting to escape into Vietnam after others in their party resisted arrest at roadblock near border.
lead_paragraph: The shooting in the Guangxi region occurred when a van carrying five Uighurs refused to stop and members of the group resisted arrest with knives, the state news media reported.

headline.main: Chinese Police Kill 2 Uighurs Fleeing to Vietnam, Reports Say

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Ministry of Public Security of the People's Republic of China
